abstract: Despite their billed spontaneity, Chris Christie’s town halls follow a bit of a script, occupying an odd space where the routine stump speech meets the unpredictable questioner.

headline.main: Chris Christie’s Town Hall:  Routine Spiced With Spontaneity

snippet: Despite their billed spontaneity, Chris Christie’s town halls follow a bit of a script, occupying an odd space where the routine stump speech meets the unpredictable questioner.
